segments.text: Anything else I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need ten 55 cents stamps and ten 32 cents stamps , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I need to send the payment to immigration for my aunt's citizenship application . They won't accept checks.How do I send the money ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can buy a money order and mail mature immigration .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Then I need a money order for 250 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please fill out the form for the money order.You also need to pay a one dollar fee .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank youse much for all your help .
segments.speaker: S2
